name: another piece of candy: sweet fusions
name_original: another piece of candy: sweet fusions
description:
another piece of candy: sweet fusions is a fusing card game with one simple goal--to present the cutest card!

this prototype features 16 different lonely wolf treat themed cards to play with. the whole thing was put together in one week so it's quite limited. i hope you can enjoy it despite that!

~ CREDITS ~

  • art+code by NomnomNami
  • additional coding help from LydianChord
  • special thanks to cloverfirefly, DarkChibiShadow, and npckc for testing as well!

i've left this game open source, so feel free to use/modify the code to use in your own ren'py game if you'd like. (please replace the art assets with your own, obviously!) credit is much appreciated.

NEXT UPDATE: the syrup and the ultimate sweet expansion...! (this game will eventually include all the characters from my webcomic, thus the title.)

if you'd like to show your support for cute little games like this, please consider leaving a tip! i'll invest it in making this game bigger and better.

and please feel free to leave suggestions in the comments for new cards or features you'd like to see in this game!

thanks for reading <3
